article_title: Bristol Township schedules Christmas tree pickup - Bucks County Courier Times: Bristol Township
article_text:
The content you are attempting to view is more than 24 hours old. If you’re already a subscriber to Bucks County Courier Times please log-in below.

If you’re not a subscriber, you can subscribe now for the first month for just 99 cents! Select Subscribe to get started.

og.description: BRISTOL TOWNSHIP — Christmas trees will be collected by Waste Management on Jan. 7 and Jan. 14. Officials urge residents to remove all lights and decorations from trees before placing them at the curb. More information: call 215-785-0500 or visit www.bristoltwp.com.
